name: HavenLightingSmartHome
0:
”Alexa turn on the kitchen”
”Alexa set the kitchen brightness to 10 percent”
”Alexa increase the kitchen temperature”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can control your Haven devices using Alexa devices, for that you need the following requirements:

* Haven account (if you already use the IPhone or Android app you have it)
* At least one Haven device: Q mini, Q Duo, K mini, K Duo, Stratus or L Series

You would be able to control the basics operations like Turn On/Off a light or zone, change the brightness and color temperature but that will depend on your device capabilities.

Device Capabilities

Q Mini or Q Duo
* Color Temperature
* Brightness
* On/Off
* Solid Color (feature under construction)

K Mini or K Duo
*Brightness
*On/Off

Stratus or L Series:
* On/Off
